equipment-plan: Production facility equipment for gas extraction and processing. Equipment includes: 1) Wellhead assemblies with gas gathering manifold, 2) Gas processing unit (maximum height 15 meters) with separation and compression equipment, 3) Storage tanks for produced water (2 x 5,000 barrel capacity), 4) Electrical switchgear and control systems housed in containerized units, 5) Emergency flare stack (height 25 meters) with safety shutdown systems, 6) Site access roads and hardstanding areas, 7) Perimeter fencing and security equipment.
